description: Constructed with the outdoor enthusiast in mind, this men's ¼ zip pullover is made of a Merino wool and recycled polyester blend that offers odor control, temperature regulation, and durability. Its underarm and back mesh panels ensure breathability, and it sports functional touches such as reflective elements and thoughtful seam construction. With this long-sleeved top on, you’ll feel great in your cool- to warm-weather activities.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport (150) LS 1/4 Zip - Mens
